column5: i was just wondering what the weeds are up to these days i have not been out in a couple of weeks, i was on cameron lake and the weeds were very low and sparse. managed about 9 wallys the first night although nothing big. the biggest was about a 2lbr. but anyways im headin out to chemong this weekend to dominate the wallys and maybe some ski's if they wanna cooperate!!  peace!

Chemong lake....yup, there's weeds  The weeds are coming along nicely. Just perfect if you ask me. The weeds that usually grow to the top, are just a couple feet under the surface now. Just right for burning spinnerbaits for muskies ......always get the odd eye doing that as well.  Sinker
I should be out Saturday night on the south side of the causeway. Which area will you be in?   Don
